name: Stena Line
goal:
Stena Line is one of the biggest ferry shipping companies in Europe and connects 10 countries with 22 routes and 38 vessels. Every year Stena Lines moves approximately 7 million freight units, 2 million passengers and 1.5 million cars. Stena Line employs approximately 5,500 staff and crew and 2015 had a turnover of abt 14 billion SEK.

Stena Line is part of the Stena AB Group which is a family owned conglomerate.
euInitiatives:
European Maritime Policy
European Ports Policy
European Transportation Policy
